content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'TransactionHeader' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'andy')
CREATE TABLE andy.TransactionHeader
	(
	 [TransactionHeaderID] uniqueidentifier,
	 [StoreRetailID] uniqueidentifier,
	 [CustomerRetailID] uniqueidentifier,
	 [Title] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Description] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Date] datetime2(0),
	 [TransactionType] nvarchar(4000),
	 [TransactionTotal] float,
	 [PaymentMethod] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Currency] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH(TransactionHeaderID),
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_TransactionHeader
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO andy.TransactionHeader
(TransactionHeaderID 1, StoreRetailID 2, CustomerRetailID 3, Title 4, Description 5, Date 6, TransactionType 7, TransactionTotal 8, PaymentMethod 9, Currency 10)
FROM 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailTransactionHeader.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM andy.TransactionHeader
GO

DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('andy.TransactionHeader');
